input: Passage: Taking my child to bed at night is one of my most special parts of my day every single day . Our bedtime routine is generally the same every day . It begins with a bath . He swims and plays in the bath tub long after he is squeaky clean . Next , he gets into pajamas and brushes his teeth . After that , he comes and holds my hand and tells me he is ready for his books . He picks some books and climbs up into bed . We pull down the covers and both get cozy . I read him two , three or four books until he feels settled and tired enough . He then tells me his favorite part of the day . I give him a kiss on the head , I blow a bunch of kisses from the doorway and say `` One Million Kisses in the Room '' . I then leave and he goes to sleep . Question: Who has to have a bath? Option1: The child Option2: the daughter

input: Passage: One of the thing that never want to miss is to going to funeral . It reminds me of myself that I am also going to die one day . This is the FACT of this life . I helped my relatives washing the body , that one of ritual that close relatives perform in my culture . It is not given to anyone else . She was woman so I could attend the washing , because I am also woman . It was very heartbreaking , as I just saw her well and alive few days ago , and now she is in front of me motionless . We finished and prepared her for burial with white clothes . Question: What did the person wear? Option1: black clothes Option2: white clothes

input: Passage: I was really excited about celebrating my birthday at my local park . I had all kinds of games planned for my friends . input: Passage: I bought these new things called sheet suspenders and I was excited to try them out . i stripped the bed and washed all the bedding and pillow cases , then dried them . input: Passage: I flew from Amsterdam to New York City last week . I had purchased and reserved my ticket a week in advance . I left the hostel I was staying and arrived at Schiphol Airport at about 21:00 . I went to and found my seat , located on the left-hand side near the middle of the plane . I placed some of my hand luggage in an overhead compartment and sat down next to another passenger who was seated to my right . I watched the rest of remaining passengers who were heading to their seats . About 20 minutes later , once everyone was seated and were given basic safety instructions by the flight attendants , the pilot announced that the we were now going to take off for New York . It was a evening flight , so I slept on and off for a little while , then began watching an in-flight movie . After about 3 hours , we were served a light dinner of a chicken entree , bread , and juice . The food was surprisingly tasty and I enjoyed it . After finishing my meal , I relaxed and occasionally looked out the window at the night sky , as well as occasionally chatting with the person sitting next to me . The plane touched down shortly afterwards , and we safely landed in New York . Question: Where was the plane headed to once it was airborne? Option1: New York Option2: Amsterdam.

input: Passage: A few weeks ago I had to go visit my family in Wisconsin . Since I live in New York , it is quite a long way to drive , so I had to buy a plane ticket . I found a flight that was at a good time , and only had a short stop in Chicago each direction , so I booked that ticket . I was able to choose my seat and pay online , I got a confirmation number and was ready to go . I made sure to get to the airport early enough so that I could print my boarding passes , check my luggage , and get through security . Question: Who was being visited? Option1: Workers at airport. input: Passage: A few of us friends were sitting around the coffee shop mulling over what we were going to do over the weekend . No one had any solid plans and everyone was kind of sad that there was noting to do when it occurred to me , we should have a game night ! Sally said she had a bunch of board games she had n’t played for a while and the more we talked about it the more excited we became at the idea . Since I have the largest aparment it only made sense for me to host the game night but Meghan asked what she was supposed to do if Sally was brining all the games . Thinking for a moment I suggested she bring something for everyone to drink . She agreed but then asked what we were going to eat so I called up Jeff who works at a restaurant to see if he wanted to bring some food from work over to our game night . Not knowing myself I asked Sally and Meghan who thought Saturday night would be best so I told Jeff it was on for Saturday night . After I got off the phone with Jeff I asked if it was ok to invite Paul and Sarah since they love board games . Meghan and Sally thought that was a great idea so I quickly called Paul and he was thrilled at the idea of him and Sarah coming to a game night so I told him to bring Sarah to my house at 7 pm on Saturday , that Sally was bringing all the games , and Jeff and Meghan were bringing the food and drinks but then I had to let Paul go to call Jeff back and let him know game night was starting at 7 pm ! Question: When are they having it? Option1: 7 AM Saturday. Option2: 7 PM Saturday.
